name: Web Calc
description: A browser based calculator that can handle multiple operators at a time, respects order of operations, and can be installed as a Progressive Web App (PWA).

name: Notes App
description: A no framework browser based notes app that allows for creating, editing, and deleting notes, with notes saved to local storage so they persist on browser refresh or restart.

name: Another Project
description: Some description of my next project, probably using NextJS.

name: This Portfolio!
description: A statically generated portfolio site using GraphQL to pull in each projects data at build time.
